Posts.Content: Hi Hope you are well! My mum has breastcancer that went to the bones and there are 5 lesions on the liver, we are from South AFrica and medicine is not as advanced as it is in USA, my mum has had taxol chemotherapy and is now on a second cause which is quite potent and is intact making her go faster down, please can you tell me what treatment you had and if there is any specific oncology centre in the states that you regard as the best that can help us! My mum is 65! We already lost our dad to renal cell carcinoma! Your assistance would be highly appreciated please! We are desperate!!!! Regards Asma
Posts.Title: Stage IV breast cancer spread to liver and bones
